title: Certificate Course in Beauty Therapy
subtitle: Professional training in skin care, salon services & beauty therapy fundamentals
description: This certificate course in beauty therapy is designed to build a strong foundation in skin care, salon hygiene, facial treatments, waxing, grooming, and client handling. The course focuses on both theoretical understanding of skin and practical salon-ready skills required to work confidently in a professional beauty environment.
whatYouWillLearn: The skin structure (about skin, skin layers, skin types, skin functions, pH level)
Daily skin care (CTM – Cleansing, Toning, Moisturizing)
